title: 43VERS
excerpt: it's a matchmaking platform where people can connect and find their soul partners based on shared values, interests, and compatibility
body: 43 Vers is a revolutionary matchmaking app designed to help people find their soul partners. With advanced algorithms and a comprehensive profile system, 43 Vers offers personalized recommendations based on users' interests, preferences, and values. Our platform fosters meaningful connections and long-lasting relationships, with features like real-time messaging, video calls, and in-app events to bring people together. 43 Vers is available on both iOS and Android, providing a seamless and user-friendly experience. Join 43 Vers today and discover your perfect match.

43 Vers is more than just a dating app, it's a matchmaking platform where people can connect and find their soul partners based on shared values, interests, and compatibility. Our app is designed to provide a personalized and enjoyable user experience, with features like personality tests, video profiles, and real-time chat. We also prioritize security and privacy, with measures like photo verification and manual profile screening to ensure a safe and trustworthy community. With 43 Vers, you can trust that you're connecting with people who are truly compatible with you and your values.

title: CricketR+
excerpt: Experience Cricket Like Never Before - Track the Game with Ease!
body: CRICKETR+ enables cricket enthusiasts to track their progress, analyze their statistics, and stay abreast of the most recent cricket news and updates. The app has live match scorecards, schedules for international and league cricket matches, and a personalized CricketR profile with detailed cricket stats. Users can also collect one-of-a-kind NFTs of cricketers and earn badges and awards for their achievements on the field. Also, the app gives registered users a premium experience without ads and with pro features.

Coverage of almost every Cricket Match, including the World Cup 2023, Pakistan super league, Indian Premier league, Bigbash league, women bigbash league, women Indian premier league, Bangladesh premier league, Lanka premier league and other national and international cricket completitions/matches and more.

title: Invoicer
excerpt: Create, manage and send invoices on-the-go. User-friendly interface with easy payment integration. Efficient business tool.

The app can also provide insights into payment trends, outstanding invoices, and customer behavior to help you make informed decisions about your business. excerpt: Secure platform to create, trade, and collect NFTs. Integration with cryptocurrency payment options. User-friendly interface.
body: Anefti an NFT project involves creating a secure platform that enables users to create, trade, and collect NFTs. This typically involves building a backend infrastructure that integrates blockchain technology to ensure the security and authenticity of NFTs. The frontend of the platform should provide a user-friendly interface, with intuitive navigation and clear messaging around NFT creation, trading, and collection. The platform should also incorporate features like digital wallets, smart contracts, and verification processes to ensure the validity of NFTs and provide a seamless user experience. Additionally, the platform should be designed with scalability in mind to accommodate growing numbers of users and transactions. Finally, it's important to stay up-to-date on the latest developments in the NFT space and make adjustments to the platform as necessary to ensure it meets the needs of users and clients alike.
strategy: Research, planning, and execution to build secure, user-friendly platform for creating, trading, and collecting NFTs.
design: We provide UI/UX design and wireframes in AdobeXD.
development: We provide a website created on ReactJS.
